titleStmt.title: The sayings of that reverend and great preacher Mr. S. Charnock, who departed this life on Wednesday the 28 of July, 1680, and was solemnly interred the 30th following.
titleStmt.author: Charnock, Stephen, 1628-1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
